snippet.title: Slime Heroes - Official Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
A game where the slimes are finally the heroes. Play together with your friends as adorable slimes - the only thing that can save the world from the evil oozy creatures and formidable bosses. Discover different weapons and create your own unique magic abilities to express the way you want to adventure.

You can wishlist the game on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1511880/Slime_Heroes/
 
See more content on Twitter: https://twitter.com/Slime_Heroes

Join on Discord if you want to see regular updates that I'm making: https://discord.gg/WmFMNr635x
